plot: Harris K Telemacher is a 'wacky weekend weatherman' for a local Los Angeles television station who is searching for meaning in his otherwise cliche ridden Los Angeles life. With the help of an insightful and talkative Freeway sign, Harris embarks on a journey through Los Angeles in pursuit of Sarah, an English reporter who has been sent to the City of Angels to research an article for the London Times.   Written by  TheMovieHippo
title: Tres mujeres para un caradura

lists.title: Películas que recomendar cuando te piden que recomiendes una película
